meanings.def: of or belonging to people, animals or things that have already been mentioned or are easily identified
used instead of his or her to refer to a person whose sex is not mentioned or not known
examples: If anyone calls, ask for their number so I can call them back.

related: While Shepherds Watched Their Flocks by Night
catch somebody with their trousers down
catch somebody with their pants down
for my, his, their, etc. part
